body.name: ASUS TUF Gaming LC II 360 ARGB All-in-One Liquid CPU Cooler with Aura Sync, 3X TUF Gaming 120mm ARGB Radiator Fans, Reinforced Tubing, and 6-Year Warranty;Widely Compatible with Latest Intel&AMD CPUs
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Wednesday, February 14. Order within 14 hrs 22 mins
features: TUF Gaming radiator fans upgraded with brighter ARGB lighting and grooved fins for improved airflow and lower noise
Decoupled low-noise pump and ARGB pump cover
Reinforced, sleeved 400mm tubing for increased durability and chassis compatibility
Support for Intel LGA 1700, 1200, 115x, and AMD AM5 and AM4 sockets
Six Year Warranty - To show our confidence in the premium durability of the TUF Gaming LC II 360 ARGB, we proudly support it with a 6-year worldwide warranty
body.description: TUF Gaming LC II 360 ARGB all-in-one liquid CPU cooler features reinforced sleeved tubing, a de-coupled low-noise pump, ARGB on upgraded 3x 120mm radiator fans and pump cover, all covered under an industry leading 6-year warranty

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A pretty good upgrade!
reviews.reviewText: I finally upgraded from the stock cpu fan and now it’s so much cooler! It was pretty easy to install too. Personally I used another thermal paste that my roommate raves about (Mx-6 I believe?).

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 20, 2022
reviews.reviewText: I chose this AOI cooler because it fits the Asus GT301 case in a top mount configuration (even this it's not supposed to). CPU temps are significantly cooler than stock Wraith cooler. My 5700G is purring now since it holds it's boost clocks much longer than before. It's also allowed my GPU to drop a few degrees since the heat is directed out the case and not blowing around. Extremely quiet even when fans are at their highest level. The mounting bracket isn't as bad as people make it out to be and the heatsink is bigger than the picture makes it look. Just be careful when installing it. My hand slipped and the copper face scratched extremely easily. At least it was in a spot that didn't matter. I just used the pre-applied thermal paste and it seems to do the job with no problems. Very happy with this purchase overall.Note: my radiator came with a small dent (hidden under the fans) and the thermal paste looks like it might of been pre-applied twice (can see the edge of a second circle) so I'm not sure if what I got was exactly 'brand new' however, everything seems to be working fine and these are seller issues... not a product issue.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Keeps my Intel Core i9-12900K cool
reviews.reviewText: I built my system using components that were above my current need, basically over engineering the system. I am not a gamer or overlocker, I built a Photo editor and Video Editor system.The idea being that the system will cover my needs for many years to come and not be pushed to it's limits.That being said, the water cooler keeps my Intel Core i9-12900K very cool, and the case keeps the entire system cool. Heat is one of the biggest component killers and is something that should be avoided.My System:Cooler Master HAF XB EVO GIGABYTE Z690 AORUS UltraEVGA Supernova 1200 P3, 80 Plus Platinum 1200WTEAMGROUP T-Force Vulcan DDR5 32GB Kit (2x16GB) 5200MHz x2 for 64GB.Intel Core i9-12900K Desktop ProcessorXFX Speedster SWFT309 AMD Radeon RX 6700 XT CORE Gaming Graphics CardASUS TUF Gaming LC 240 ARGB All-in-one Liquid CPU CoolerNoctua NF-A20 PWM, Premium Quiet Fan, 4-Pin (200x30mm, Brown)I have seen recent reviews indicating that the software doesn't work, funny there isn't any software from Asus for this cooler, see picture

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 22, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars It's fancy but not the best cooler for an Intel i9 12000k
reviews.reviewText: I didn't expect this to be the best cooler I've used, but I expected to not have my Intel i9 12000k hitting 105 degrees instantly on heavy load. I know that this chip runs hot, which is why I invested in an AIO, but these temps are not sustainable for long processing loads. The chip isn't thermal throttling, but it gets close. I've also removed and reapplied my own thermal paste which helped to reduce temps by about 5 degrees, but still not enough for me to be comfortable. After under-volting my CPU, I was able to bring the temps down to around 90 degrees Celsius with minimum impact on the performance, but that shouldn't be necessary to keep temps under 100.The display is the coolest part of this AIO and the iCue software makes customizing it extremely easy with endless variability. There are two modes for Corsair controlled hardware, whatever you configured and the device hardware default. Whenever the PC is locked or booting up/shutting down, the hardware defaults will kick in. Those defaults can be configured in the iCue software as well. Those defaults however only apply to the RBG, not the cooling and fan modes.All in all, one of the coolest AIOs on the market, but may consider looking elsewhere if you have a 12000k.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 12, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Most Excellent AIO
reviews.reviewText: 1. First off this AIO works!! Ryzen 9 7950X3D stays at 35-40C idle never hit 80C on cinebench max load.2. Second this design is hands down the best / easiest to install AIO I have ever seen. ARGB pops and looks great while the 4 mounting screws is all you need to attach and your done.3. Third it is quiet, I have to lean in to hear it if at all .. no noise problems whatsoever.Definitely recommend this unit it has been a great purchase for me.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 14, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Quiet, well built, great product
reviews.reviewText: I've built computers using components since the late 1980"s. I use Asus, MSI and EVGA brands, Corsair memory. This CPU cooler installed in about 30 minutes and performs very well. I did add extra heat sink paste to the face of the cooler before before mounting it to the CPU. Although this is not absolutely necessary.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars I tried to run with an i9 12th gen
reviews.reviewText: It did not work. I think it might’ve been a defective pump so I went with a deep cool 720 and it worked perfectly. My tunes were at 89 to 92 with this cooler. I had a 12 gen 12k

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 7, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Runs nice and cool
reviews.reviewText: I just built a 12th generation ddr5 system and this cooler keeps my i5 12600k nice and cool. It did, in fact come with the lga 1700 bracket in the box. I am experiencing a core max of 59c after gaming for 4 hours (after running for 72 hours) with an ambient temp of 78F. This cools better than my corsair h100i v2 in the same case. I would recommend this to anyone looking for a good all in one cooling solution! I will update this review should any problems arise with this cooler.

El producto no venía sellado, al momento de sacar el producto tenía anomalías de que lo habían golpeado en la parte del radiador, al momento de instalarlo funcionó sin problema pero obviamente falta hacer más pruebas para ver qué no haya sucedido nada con el aio. Puedo notar que es de muy buen material pero intento probarlo y ver qué no tenga ninguna fuga ya que me generó mucha desconfianza que haya llegado de está manera y definitivamente no parece un producto nuevo por la manipulación que le dieron.

reviews.reviewTitle: Perfect for a TUF Gaming ARGB build
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. Upgraded to this from a Silverstone AR-12-TUF air cooler. Temperatures are superb ~70ish on my 5600X where ambient temp is ~30. Fits perfectly in the TUF Gaming GT301 case with ample ram clearance. ARGB control with aura sync is superb enhancing overall aesthetics. Great value👍

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on June 27, 2022
reviews.reviewText: Had this cooler for a few months now and it's working great, I have a i9 11900k OC and it's never gone above 65⁰c, can't complain

Mantiene mi CPU a buena temperatura, no siento que haga tanto ruido. Trae incluido adaptador para LGA 1700, 1200 y para procesador AMD.Update: Los ventiladores hacen mucho ruido, opté por sustituirlos.
